Commands.Lancet: 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  Moderately restores HP based on HP damage dealt, up to 20% of Max HP  Grants 「Ronso's Trait」 for 3 turns   While 「Ronso's Trait」 is active:  - 「Lancet」 turns to 「Lancet & Thrust Kick」  　∟ Triggers another 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack at the end  - 「HP Attack」 turns to 「Jump」  　∟ 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  　∟ Low Action Delay   「Ronso's Trait」 has the following effects:  - Raises own Max BRV and Attack  - Raises party Defense
Commands.Mighty Guard: Raises party BRV based on Attack  Grants 「HP Damage Reduction」 to party for 3 turns   While 「Ronso's Trait」 is active:  - 「Mighty Guard」 turns to 「Mighty Guard & Bad Breath」  　∟ Triggers a 1-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  　∟ HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies  　∟ Inflicts 「Bad Breath」 for 3 turns   「Bad Breath」 has the following effects:  - Lowers Max BRV and Attack  - Deals BRV damage every turn
Commands.Attack Guard All: Slightly raises party Attack and marginally raises party Defense for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Nova: 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies

Passives.Lancet Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Lancet ,  Lancet & Thrust Kick
Passives.HP Damage Guard: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage.
Passives.Mighty Guard & Bad Breath Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Mighty Guard & Bad Breath
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.BRV value remains at 1.
Passives.Ronso Tribe's Guardian: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Defense while  Ronso's Trait  is active
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Lancet Extend: When using  Lancet ,  Lancet & Thrust Kick :- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves  Max BRV Up ,  Attack Up  effects of  Ronso's Trait  and adds a  Medium Defense Up  effectWhen using  Lancet :- Increases the number of BRV hits by 1- Moderately raises total BRV potencyWhen using  Lancet & Thrust Kick :- Increases the number of BRV hits by 2- Tremendously raises total BRV potencyWhile  Ronso's Trait  is active:-  BRV Attack  turns to  BRV Attack+    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2   Greatly raises total BRV potencyWhen using  Jump :- Raises BRV based on Attack before the BRV hit- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost All: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Mighty Guard Extend: When using  Mighty Guard & Bad Breath :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Passives.Resonance of Power and Defense: Raises party Attack by 10% and party Defense by 20%
Passives.Attack Guard All Extend: When using  Attack Guard All :- Marginally improves  Attack Up  effect- Slightly improves  Defense Up  effect

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Attack Guard Up All  use +1Duration of  Attack Guard Up All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Calamity Spear CP: 35: When using  Mighty Guard ,  Mighty Guard & Bad Breath :- Raises the BRV Gain based on Attack- Improves  HP Damage Reduction  and extends its durationWhen using [Mighty Guard & Bad Breath]:- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Improves the effects of  Bad Breath  and extends its duration
Weapons.Astral Spear CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Nova
Weapons.Halberd CP: 15: When using  Lancet ,  Lancet & Thrust Kick :- Raises BRV potency- HP recovery effect becomes party-wide- Converts excess HP recovered to BRV- Improves the effects of  Ronso's Trait  and extends its duration
